summary: A group of teenagers accidentally release an evil spirit that starts to possess them one by one.
cast: Stephen Lang|Kevin Chapman|Kelly Blatz|Brittany Curran|Brett Dier|Gage Golightly|Nick Nicotera|Nick Nordella|Michael Ormsby|Malena Corso|Meredith Prunty|Ashley Tramonte|Hilary Pingle|Aaron Dorsey|Lindsay MacDonald|Jarret LeMaster|Laura Putnam|Ashley MacDonald|Caitlin O'Neill|Adam Teper|Savanah Lee|Shannon Hartman|Kaitlyn Bouchard|Alisa Ricci|Tyler Clayton Appel|Ariel Dorsey|Jimmy Folco|Brandon Paul Desorcy|Dave Lanoue|Joanne Vieira|Allison Kirwan|Gaia Liotta|John Loughlin|John Bokta|Domonique Andrews|Xaidenn Rodriguez|Xion Rodriguez|Jim Ford|Mark Burzenski|Steve Sanders|Dyan Humes-Nispel|Bobbie Mannix|Reinhard Denke|Marcus Nispel|Nicholas Ryan Chung|Karina Junker|Jason Amherst|Ben Tanguay
title: Exeter
